articles.title: Amid allegations at Juilliard, classical music leaders demand change - The Washington Post
articles.description: About 450 composers, musicians and arts leaders sign letter asking the Juilliard School to address new reports of sexual harassment and misconduct.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
An open letter calling on the Juilliard School to take disciplinary action against composer Robert Beaser for alleged decades-long abuse of women and power has attracted the si… [+8757 chars]
